data.title: Faculty at Brave Thinking Institute
data.meta_description: John Boggs is the CEO of Brave Thinking Institute and Director / Founder of our Business and Leadership Division.
data.text:
As the CEO of Brave Thinking Institute and Director of its Business and Leadership Division, John Boggs infuses this company with vision-driven passion, strategic business expertise and a strong personal practice of self-leadership. As a faculty member of the Brave Thinking Institute, John shares business and leadership training with coaches being certified by the institute.

John is a national and international award-winning executive who combines his business and leadership experience with training in psychology and international speech communication to deliver highly effective programs for leading international companies and executives.

Before joining Brave Thinking Institute, John was instrumental in turning a failing real estate development startup into a thriving company with over $60 million in annual revenue.

John has coached thousands of business professionals to greater clarity, increased revenues and tangible strategies that empower more effective leadership. John has also coached and consulted high-level executives at the World Bank, Johnson & Johnson, Toyota Motors, The Marriott Corporation, CitiGroup and Century 21.

Known by many as the “Action Man,” John helps us do what we know we need to do, no matter what challenges stand in our way.

Paula Johnson Account Sales Manager

for a Fortune 500 company

I knew I needed guidance in changing perceptions and perspectives as a leader. With John, my team and I worked on a new sales process that resonated with our core values. Using his leadership tools, my team sold $6.2M – the most sold by a single team in the history of the company! I was given an award as ‘The Elite Sales Leader of the Year’. The respect and care he gave me is how the heart of a true leader shows up. I am forever grateful.”

Michele Solloway

PhD, MPA, SEP, RPP, LMT President, Renew Your CORE

with Trauma Healing

I have worked with John over the past year and I can't speak highly enough of him!... Working with John helped me to find my voice, articulate my "true" mission, and build the confidence to take on the really big vision I have created for myself.”

Richard Lovejoy President

A New Leaf Company

John has taught me to become a leader of myself first and then others. He has a wonderful way of coaching by consistently asking the right questions… I have actively used his coaching to create remarkable results for me. I am healthier and wealthier in all areas of my life. John is the best and most effective coach I have ever had!”
